import React, { useReducer } from 'react'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; function Login() { const [login, setLogin] = useReducer( (state, newState) => ({ ...state, ...newState }), { email: '', password: '' }, ); const { email, password } = login; const handleLogin = ({ target: { name, value } }) => setLogin({ [name]: value }); return (

Login

); } export default Login;
